name: Math Games Numbers Connect
description:
Math Games - Number Connect is multi-level math puzzle game, that is entertains and challenges you as you progress through the levels. Play Numbers Connect and bring out the Math Genius in you whilst having countless hours of fun!

How To Play
There two play modes:
1 - Swipe Mode: Simply connect the numbers and math functions to form the correct equation to achieve the displayed target numbers.
2 - Enter Mode: Key in the numbers and math functions in the correct order to form the equation to achieve the displayed target numbers.

Benefits of Metal Math used in Math Games - Numbers Connect
1 - Keeps your brain quick and sharp
2 - Increases mental agility and intelligence
3 - Improves memory
4 - Improves your Number Sense
5 - Helps achieve mindfulness through focus

Great Features of Math Games - Numbers Connect

Have hours of fun - With multiple levels, gradually presenting harder puzzles, Numbers Connect gives you countless hours of fun.
Exercise your brain - Numbers Connect stimulates your brain and keeps it active and young.
Use hints: Use our hints if you stump upon a puzzle you can't solve.
Play at you own pace: There is no time limit or penalties for incorrect answers.
Play offline - Numbers Connect does not require an Internet connection. Play anytime, anywhere.
